titleStmt.title: Arguments against bowing at the name of Iesvs proving the unlawfullnesse and injustice of imposing that posture in Gods worship, which is neither injoyned by word of God, nor by the canon of the Church ... / composed abovt five years since by a reverend minister of the city of London.
titleStmt.author: Reverend minister of the city of London.
Wickins, William, 1614-1699.

notesStmt.note: Attributed by Wing to William Wickins, probably erroneously.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
